nodes.text: This grave was the Daughter's tomb on the planet Mortis. After the Daughter sacrificed her life, the Father buried her body here with the Dagger of Mortis laid upon her breast.

It was later visited by the Son, who would also be the grave's final visitor, who wanted to retrieve the dagger. There, he admitted that he truly loved his sister. The grave had a roll away door. Anakin Skywalker visited the Father where he asked his advice on what he should do about the Son.
